scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run prepare && (npm run build:image & npm run build:i18n & npm run build:tson) && npm run watch:ts
scripts.clean: rm -rf dest & rm -rf dest.zip & rm -rf .DS_Store & rm -rf workspace/**/.DS_Store
scripts.build:image: mkdir dest/assets && mkdir dest/assets/images && cp -r workspace/assets/images dest/assets
scripts.release-build: npm run clean && npm run prepare && (npm run build:image & npm run build:i18n & npm run build:tson) && npm run build:ts && zip -r dest.zip dest/
